page.title: 18Supernatural Eccleshall
page.content: Eccleshall has no famous ghost story, but it does have some ghosts. It is a fact that these restless spirits have been experienced by people who did not previously know of their existence. One spectre is that of a benign elderly gentleman who has made himself known, in a friendly way, to visitors in his house. Another is more frightening and seems to wander restlessly over an area to the west of Eccleshall. This is believed to be the spirit of a man who committed suicide about a hundred years ago. Poltergeists have also been experienced in houses in the area.
